popularityCurve.label: this research shows that when the estrogen receptor-alpha is restored to adult mice that have been missing it their entire lives it is still possible to enhance memory and learning

clusterList.phrase: this research shows that when the estrogen receptor-alpha is restored to adult mice that have been missing it their entire lives it is still possible to enhance memory and learning
the research brings up the idea that local activation of non-nuclear estrogen receptor-alpha is important for regulating memory processes in the hippocampus

but our data do suggest that calcineurin inhibition should be investigated in future studies which also should look at how amyloid-beta causes calcium overload and whether removing plaques really does improve neuronal health
